_comment: Example table profile with bet_input_box region for auto-play

button_regions._comment_bet_input_box: Optional: Region for bet amount input field. If provided, the bot will click here, clear the field, type the exact amount, then click the bet/raise button. If not provided, it will just click bet/raise with the default amount.
button_regions._comment_quick_bet_buttons: Optional: Regions for quick bet sizing buttons. These are used by BET_HALF_POT and BET_POT actions. The bot will click the sizing button (½ POT or POT), then click bet_confirm_button_region. IMPORTANT: You must calibrate these regions for your screen resolution and poker room.

half_pot_button_region._comment: PLACEHOLDER: Calibrate this to match the '½ POT' button position on your screen

pot_button_region._comment: PLACEHOLDER: Calibrate this to match the 'POT' button position on your screen

bet_confirm_button_region._comment: PLACEHOLDER: Calibrate this to match the bet confirmation button ('Miser', 'Bet', etc.) on your screen. Usually same as the 'bet' or 'raise' button.
